thread.section_title: Hotel Declic - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely hotel- friendly staff!
thread.title_full: Lovely hotel- friendly staff! - Review of Hotel Declic, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Abby J
title: Lovely hotel- friendly staff!
text:
Reception staff are so friendly and welcoming from the very start!
Good location with supermarkets/cafes locally....only 5minute walk to the metro
About 15minute drive from airport so taxi was not expensive!
Rooms are amazing!, we had a suite and couldn't ask for anthing better!, very clean
